client_Id: <User Id from GMAIL API> See: https://nodemailer.com/smtp/oauth2/
client_secret: <Client Secret from GMAIL API> See: https://nodemailer.com/smtp/oauth2/
refresh_token: <Refresh token of Outh2 to autogenerate access token> See https://nodemailer.com/smtp/oauth2/
sender_email: <Email associated with all the above data to send email from > see https://nodemailer.com/smtp/oauth2/
// const REDIRECT_URI = 'https://develop: <What name to show of a sender>
receiver_email_list: <List of emails to notify> see https://nodemailer.com/smtp/oauth2/
cron: <Node-Cron expression to set, how often you want to send the email. See https://crontab.guru/>
path: <Absolute Path of the package.json file you want to keep an eye on>
